summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4694 for the improvement of Trenton Street, from 12th Avenue South to the east line of Lot 39, Block 47, South Park Addition; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues, by constructing sewers and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 54425, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
